Uses of Interface
org.flowable.engine.delegate.DelegateTask

  • Packages that use DelegateTask 
    Package Description
    org.flowable.engine.delegate
    Interfaces used to include Java code in a process as the behavior of an activity or as a listener to process events with JavaDelegates.
